discord_slash.http module¶

class discord_slash.http.SlashCommandRequest¶

Bases: object

async post(_resp, _id, token)¶

Sends command response POST request to Discord API.

Parameters

  • _resp (dict) – Command response.

  • _id – Command message id.

  • token – Command message token.

Returns

True if succeeded.

Raises

error.RequestFailure - Requesting to API has failed.
